rules_text:
Choose one – 
• Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library.
• Wounded creatures you control stop being wounded. Put a [+]1/[+]1 counter on each of those creatures.
• Creatures you control that are blocking or being blocked by wild creatures gain first strike until end of turn. [i](Bears, Birds, Cats, Rats, and Spiders are wild creatures.)[/i]
